## RenderedConnection.(constructor)

Constructs a new instance of the `RenderedConnection` class

**Signature:**

```typescript

```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  source | [BlockSvg](./blockly.blocksvg.md) | The block establishing this connection. |
